SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Martinberg Hot Dog?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Martinberg Hot Dog is arc {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Cisnerosfurt Sandwich?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Cisnerosfurt Sandwich is arc {Martinberg Hot Dog}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Parkershire Burger} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Martinberg Hot Dog and World Donuts is {133}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 165? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {187} from {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} to {Parkershire Burger}, a flow of {172} from {World Donuts} to {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 39? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {30} from {Martinberg Hot Dog} to {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 89 and 112? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {92} from {Parkershire Burger} to {Martinberg Hot Dog}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Parkershire Burger to Cisnerosfurt Sandwich or from Cisnerosfurt Sandwich to World Donuts?
NC.A: The flow from {Parkershire Burger} to {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Cisnerosfurt Sandwich to Parkershire Burger, from Parkershire Burger to Martinberg Hot Dog, or from Parkershire Burger to Cisnerosfurt Sandwich?
NC.A: The flow from {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} to {Parkershire Burger} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {World Donuts}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Cisnerosfurt Sandwich} and {Parkershire Burger}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Parkershire Burger, Arc Cisnerosfurt Sandwich, Arc World Donuts, Arc Martinberg Hot Dog}.
